mapper.insert: INSERT INTO (agenda_id, summary_time) VALUE (#{agendaId},#{summaryTime}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE summary_time = VALUES(summary_time)
INSERT INTO agenda_summary(item_id, summarizer_id, status) SELECT #{itemId}, agenda.owner_id, 'todo' FROM JOIN agenda ON agenda.agenda_id = .agenda_id

INSERT INTO agenda_summary(item_id, summarizer_id, status) SELECT #{itemId}, cooperation_member.user_id, 'todo' FROM JOIN agenda ON agenda.agenda_id = .agenda_id JOIN cooperation_agenda ON cooperation_agenda.agenda_id = agenda.agenda_id JOIN cooperation_agenda_participant ON cooperation_agenda_participant.cooperation_agenda_id = cooperation_agenda.cooperation_agenda_id JOIN cooperation_member ON cooperation_member.member_id = cooperation_agenda_participant.member_id
